title: UI/UX Designer
summary: The Apple Beats team is looking for a human interface designer with the passion and skills to create high quality interaction, graphic, sound, and haptic experiences for our digital and physical products in a fast-paced environment. You’re a problem solver and self-starter that possesses a unique blend of interaction design, visual design, and prototyping skills. You’re equally adept in communicating with designers and engineers to define and execute end-user product experiences as you are in developing and sharing new innovative concepts through story telling, visuals, and presentations. Apply today!
description:
-  Oversee full design process from establishing requirements, defining features, and developing deliverables rooted in user-centered design and feasibility
-  Distill complex design and interaction concepts, present, and debate them with designers, engineers, and leadership
-  Iterate on intuitive experience concepts through rapid prototyping
-  Deliver high-quality design solutions under tight deadlines and with input from many cross-functional stakeholders and user feedback
-  Document interaction details and design specifications for implementation
-  Requires problem solving, attention to detail, and adaptability to rapid change
key_qualifications:
7+ years of related work experience
Expert knowledge of user-centered design principles and a strategic vision for crafting innovative design solutions
Mastery of Sketch, Adobe Creative Suite, Keynote, and similar design tools
Ability to develop and validate design concepts through sketches, wireframes, visual comps, and prototypes
Comfortable with working independently and collaborating with cross-functional partners in design, software, hardware
Excellent communication skills and a keen eye for detail
Expertise in handling simultaneous complex projects while maintaining high quality design standards—excels in time management
Commitment to designing inclusive and accessible products
High level of curiosity for technology amplified by your design craft
Knowledge of prototyping in interaction tools and/or code desired
additional_requirements: Link to portfolio that demonstrates your hands-on expertise; showcases excellence in interaction design, visual design, and problem solving.
